questions.question: What is Daffodil AI Club?
questions.answer: Daffodil AI Club (DAIC) is the premier artificial intelligence community at Daffodil International University. We focus on fostering innovation, research, and hands-on learning in AI and Machine Learning.

questions.question: How can I join the club?
questions.answer: To join, navigate to the click 'Register Now' on the home page. You'll need to fill out the form using your official university email.

questions.question: How do I become a member?
questions.answer: Membership is open to all DIU students. Simply visit our website, go to the registration section, and sign up with your @diu.edu.bd email address.

questions.question: What are the benefits of joining?
questions.answer: Members get access to exclusive workshops, priority registration for events, certificates, networking opportunities with industry experts, and the chance to work on real-world AI projects.

questions.question: Is membership free?
questions.answer: DAIC membership details regarding fees are usually announced during the recruitment drive. Please check the registration page for the most current information.

questions.question: Do I need prior AI knowledge to join?
questions.answer: No! We welcome students from all backgrounds. Our workshops and sessions range from beginner to advanced levels.

questions.question: Who can join the club?
questions.answer: Any current student of Daffodil International University with a valid student ID and email address is eligible to join.

questions.question: Why do I need a university email?
questions.answer: We use your @diu.edu.bd email to verify your status as a current student of the university.

questions.question: What is a Member ID?
questions.answer: A Member ID (e.g., DAIC-Spring-2024-001) is a unique identifier assigned to you upon registration. It's used for event check-ins and tracking your contributions.

questions.question: How do I participate in events?
questions.answer: Go to the 'Events' page on our website, select an upcoming event, and click 'Register'. You may need to log in to your account first.

questions.question: Do I get certificates for events?
questions.answer: Yes! We provide certificates for most workshops, hackathons, and competitions. These are often digital and can be showcased on your profile.

questions.question: What is the Member Dashboard?
questions.answer: The Member Dashboard is your personal hub on the website where you can view your profile, registered events, earned badges, and updated points.

questions.question: Who runs the Daffodil AI Club?
questions.answer: The club is run by an Executive Panel of students, guided by Convener and Co-Convener faculty members from the CSE/SWE departments.

questions.question: Can I submit a blog post?
questions.answer: Yes, members can contribute technical blogs. Check the 'Blog' section for submission guidelines. Content must be original and related to AI/Tech.

questions.question: What is the Mission of DAIC?
questions.answer: Our mission is to bridge the gap between academic learning and industry requirements by providing hands-on experience and a platform for innovation.

questions.question: Where is the club office?
questions.answer: Our activities are primarily centered at the Daffodil International University campus. Specific room locations for workshops are announced per event.

questions.question: How do I contact the club?
questions.answer: You can reach us via the 'Contact Us' page on the website, or email us directly at our official club email address listed there.

questions.question: What is the Points System?
questions.answer: The Points System rewards active members. You earn points for attending events, winning competitions, and contributing to projects. High points can lead to leaderboard recognition.

questions.question: How does the Leaderboard work?
questions.answer: The Leaderboard displays the top-performing members based on their accumulated points from club activities and contributions.

questions.question: Does the website support Dark Mode?
questions.answer: Yes! Our website is designed with a modern dark 'Nexus' theme by default to provide a comfortable and premium viewing experience.

questions.question: Who developed this website?
questions.answer: This website was developed by Reduan Ahmad. You can find more credits in the footer.

questions.question: Can I showcase my project here?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We have a 'Projects' section where members can showcase their AI/ML projects. Contact the technical lead for submission details.

questions.question: What kind of events do you organize?
questions.answer: We organize workshops, seminars, hackathons, coding competitions, research talks, and project showcases.

questions.question: Is there an alumni section?
questions.answer: Yes, we honor our past leaders and contributors in the Alumni section, keeping the network strong even after graduation.

questions.question: How do I get a unique Member ID?
questions.answer: Your unique Member ID is generated automatically when your registration is approved by the admin panel.

questions.question: Can I update my profile?
questions.answer: Yes, log in to your dashboard and navigate to 'Profile Settings' to update your bio, social links, and skills.

questions.question: What technologies are used in this website?
questions.answer: This website is built using Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion for a smooth and modern experience.

questions.question: How is attendance taken?
questions.answer: We use a QR-code based system. At events, you simply scan your digital member card or a provided QR code to mark your attendance.

questions.question: Is the chatbot real AI?
questions.answer: I am a smart rule-based assistant designed to help you navigate the Daffodil AI Club website. I don't 'think' like a human, but I know all about this site!

questions.question: What if I forget my password?
questions.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. You will receive a reset link at your registered university email.

questions.question: How do I recognize the Executive Panel?
questions.answer: Visit the 'Executives' page to see the profiles of our current President, Vice President, and other departmental secretaries.

questions.question: Can I be an executive?
questions.answer: Executive selection usually happens annually. Active members with good contribution records are encouraged to apply during recruitment.

questions.question: Do you have a gallery?
questions.answer: Yes, check out our Gallery page to see photos and videos from past hackathons, workshops, and energetic club sessions.

questions.question: What is the difference between a Member and an Executive?
questions.answer: Members participate in events and learn. Executives manage the club, organize events, and handle potential leadership responsibilities.

questions.question: Where is the registration form?
questions.answer: The registration form is available during recruitment periods via the 'Register' button on the homepage or the dedicated Membership page.

questions.question: Can I learn Python here?
questions.answer: Yes, Python is a core language for AI. We frequently host Python workshops for data science and machine learning.

questions.question: Who are the Faculty Advisors?
questions.answer: Our advisors are distinguished faculty members from the CSE and SWE departments who provide guidance and mentorship to the club.

questions.question: Is there a Discord or WhatsApp group?
questions.answer: Yes, official members are invited to our private Discord/WhatsApp communities for day-to-day communication and support.

questions.question: How often are events held?
questions.answer: We aim to hold at least one major event or workshop every month during the semester.

questions.question: What is 'FadeContent'?
questions.answer: That's a technical term for one of the cool animations checking out right now! We use advanced animations to make this site feel alive.
